rows: The current status of the bank account (e.g., "Active," "Closed," "Locked"). Required.
Type of bank account (e.g., "Checking account (DDA)"). Determines the layout and fields shown on the page.
Individual customer assigned to this bank account.If populated, a separate block displays the customer's profile details (name, age, location, email, and primary phone numbers).
The company associated with the Contact.If populated, a separate block displays the organization's profile details (name, location, web address, and primary phone).
The product activated using the bank account.
Application used to create the bank account.
Contract associated with the bank account. Required.
Branch or division responsible for the bank account.
html:
Field

Description

Status

The current status of the bank account (e.g., "Active," "Closed," "Locked"). Required.

Account number

Unique bank account number. Required.

Type

Type of bank account (e.g., "Checking account (DDA)"). Determines the layout and fields shown on the page.

Contact

Individual customer assigned to this bank account.

If populated, a separate block displays the customer's profile details (name, age, location, email, and primary phone numbers).

Legal entity

The company associated with the Contact.

If populated, a separate block displays the organization's profile details (name, location, web address, and primary phone).

Product

The product activated using the bank account.

Application

Application used to create the bank account.

Contract

Contract associated with the bank account. Required.

Branch

Branch or division responsible for the bank account.
